article_title: Funeral of assassinated deputy Hamas leader to take place in Beirut.
sentence: Funeral  of  assassinated  deputy  Hamas  leader  to  take  place  in  Beirut.

article_title: Funeral of assassinated deputy Hamas leader to take place in Beirut.
sentence: The  deputy  Hamas  leader  was  assassinated  in  the  city  on  Tuesday,  ramping  up  fears  about  Israel's  war  with  Hamas  turning  into  a  wider  regional  conflict.
